name: Solaria Moon
description: Solaria Moon is a space adventure in 3D with an outstanding script full of challenging puzzles to solve and mysteries to uncover.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-650, 3.2 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 Ghz Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 470 de 1 GB/AMD HD 7870 de 2 GB Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz or AMD FX-8350, 4.0 GHz Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 de 3 GB/AMD R9 290 de 4 GB Storage: 10 GB available space
